name: delete_behavior
description: Validates that API delete behavior follows Solace REST API conventions as per ADR

conditions.message: DELETE operations on non-existent resources MUST return 404 Not Found
DELETE operations on resources that have already been deleted MUST return 404 Not Found
DELETE operations MUST NOT return 204 No Content for non-existent resources
DELETE operations MUST NOT return 200 OK for non-existent resources
DELETE operations MUST return 204 No Content for successful deletions
